required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of CRD007 in Patients With Abdominal Aorta Aneurisms.
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Randomised, Uncontrolled Trial Investigating the Pharmacokinetics of CRD007 After Single Dose Administration to Subjects With Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm (AAA)

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration
Denmark: Danish Health and Medicines Authority

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to determine the plasma levels of CRD007 in patients with abdominal aortic aneurysms after the administration of single doses of tablets containing 10, 25 and 40 mg CRD007.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label

primary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of CRD007 will be measured and standard pharmacokinetic parameters as Cmax will be measured

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics - time to maximum plasma concentration (tmax)
primary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of CRD007 will be measured and standard pharmacokinetic parameters as tmax will be measured.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics - Area under the plasma concentration curve (AUC)
primary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of CRD007 will be measured and standard pharmacokinetic parameters as AUC will be measured.
Plasma concentrations of CRD007 will be measured and standard pharmacokinetic parameters as t1/2 will be measured

secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of dose linearity in the dose range 10 - 40 mg
To estimate the accumulation of CRD007 in the dose range 10 - 40 mg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Infra-renal abdominal aortic aneurysm
Exclusion Criteria:
- Significant concurrent disease or medical conditions that are deemed to interfere with the pharmacokinetics or the safety of CRD007 conduct of the trial
